Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Levitate.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knock Up

Mental_Blast.display_help: This attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Tornado.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are taking psionic damage over time.

Psionic_Slash.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing high Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Psionic_Slash.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Dominate_Mind.display_help: You crush your target's mind dealing moderate psionic damage over time as well as having a chance to hold your foe for a short time. Damage: Moderate DoT(Psionic), Recharge: Fast
Dominate_Mind.display_target_help: You have been held by the Dominate Mind attack.

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

Fly.display_help: The character becomes a reflection of another reality, and is semi transparent while glowing. The character can also fly, as per the Flight power.

Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your Attack rate.

Reveal_Weakness.display_help: The Scryer peers deep into their victim's mind and finds what they are most vulnerable to. Targets affected by this power have their defense and damage resistance reduced for a short time. Recharge: Long
Reveal_Weakness.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistance to damage has been reduced.

Subdual.display_help: Subdual deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdual.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Mental_Blast.display_help: This attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Soothe_Mind.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally for a moderate amount of health. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Long

Fortitude.display_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single targeted ally's accuracy, damage potential, and defense. The target ally will even take less damage from those few attacks that do hit him. Fortitude even protects the target ally from psionic attacks and damage.
Fortitude.display_target_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single targeted ally's accuracy, damage potential, and defense. The target ally will even take less damage from those few attacks that do hit him. Fortitude even protects the target ally from psionic attacks and damage.
Fortitude.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your To Hit, Damage and Defense.

Fortune.display_help: Seekers are Seers that specialize in reading the thousands of possible futures and finding the ones that are most likely. By being able to do this, they are able to predict their enemies' actions with relative ease. While this power is active, the user and all nearby allies will receive a bonus To Hit as well as resistance to status effects.
Fortune.display_target_help: Seekers are Seers that specialize in reading the thousands of possible futures and finding the ones that are most likely. By being able to do this, they are able to predict their enemies' actions with relative ease. While this power is active, the user and all nearby allies will receive a bonus To Hit as well as resistance to status effects.

Resistance.display_help: Seers are able to predict their foes' incoming attacks granting them a minor defense buff, and are quite resistant to psychic damage.
